trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_000<tab>Greetings, adventurer. Is there something you require of me?
TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_010<tab>I am a conjurer of Stillglade Fane, sent here to assist the resident Hearer in conveying the will of the elementals to the people.

TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_011<tab>The Calamity left grievous wounds upon the Twelveswood. In order to rebuild without unduly hindering its recovery, it was decided that a new settlement would be founded here, upon the water.

TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_012<tab>This meant we did not have to encroach on the forest any more than was necessary. And what lumber we <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> require was taken sparingly and with all due consideration. So do we preserve the harmony between man and elemental─a harmony that I have the honor of facilitating.
TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_020<tab>As you can doubtless see for yourself, Fallgourd Float is a settlement built upon the water.

TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_021<tab>Situated along the highroad to Coerthas, it is favored as a waypoint for northbound merchants. All travelers are urged to experience the famed hospitality of the Bobbing Cork.

TEXT_REGFSTFALLGOURDFLOAT_00130_THIERRAND_000_022<tab>Alas, the number of visitors has seen a decline of late. It has proven exceedingly laborious to keep the roads and bridges leading hither in good repair, and the journey to Coerthas has grown perilous.
